name: Sophia (dontcallmebrownie)
description:
This is Sophia, she isn't sure what's going on.

No one else is around, the only indication of humanity are the structures left behind, and these strange notes left by... someone...

Do you ever feel like you're being watched?

**

As of May 1st, 2018 this page only contains a Demo, an old one at that, this is currently being ported and improved as I can get the work done. Devlogs will be posted on a semi-regular basis to keep you guys updated (and to keep me accountable).

Anyway, the current release state is not representative of the actual current state of development.

Lots of new stuff coming.

**
